amendment.description: Amendment adds a minority health expert as a representative to the Pain Management Best Practices Inter-Agency Task Force.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 114-551 to insert a minority health expert as a representative to the Pain Management Best Practices Inter-Agency Task Force established by this bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watson Coleman amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mrs. Watson Coleman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Watson Coleman amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mrs. Watson Coleman.
